title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Overview
RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12025 Gyroscope Module Overview
content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital
parent_content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12025 Gyroscope Module Overview
content: With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.
parent_content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12025 Mounting Mechanism and GPIO Requirements
content:
**Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12025 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12025 module can be mounted on the slots: **C, D, E, & F**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
parent_content:
**Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12025 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12025 module can be mounted on the slots: **C, D, E, & F**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
RAK12025 has two digital output lines, so you need two GPIOs from WisBlock Core. It means RAK12025 should be used on a sensor slot with two available GPIOs. However, WB_IO2 is used to control 3V3_S. Hence, RAK12025 is used only on slots without WB_IO2 like sensor slots C and D on WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** Mounting of RAK12025

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12025 Mounting Mechanism and GPIO Requirements

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module Pinout and Slot Configuration [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12025 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pin, **INT2**, **INT1**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to Wisblock connector.  
> **Image:** RAK12025 pinouts
parent_content:
The RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12025 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pin, **INT2**, **INT1**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to Wisblock connector.  
> **Image:** RAK12025 pinouts  
If a 24-pin WisBlock Sensor connector is used, the IO used for the output pulse depends on what slot the module is plugged in. The following table shows the default IO used for different slots:  
The table below shows the default IOs used for different slots using INT1:  
| SLOT C | SLOT D | SLOT E | SLOT F |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| WB_IO4 | WB_IO6 | WB_IO3 | WB_IO5 |  
When using INT2, the default IOs used for different slots is shown in the table below:  
| SLOT C | SLOT D | SLOT E | SLOT F |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| WB_IO3 | WB_IO5 | WB_IO4 | WB_IO6 |
